ActivationUserGroupId.description: A reference to the ID of the public group consisting of users who can access the sandbox. The user who created the sandbox is added to the group by default.

ApexClassId.description: A reference to the ID of an Apex class that runs after each copy of the sandbox. Allows you to perform business logic on the sandbox to prepare it for use.

AutoActivate.description: If true, you can activate a sandbox refresh immediately.

CopyArchivedActivities.description: If true, archived activity data is copied to the sandbox.

CopyChatter.description: If true, archived Chatter data is copied to the sandbox.

Description.description: A description of the sandbox, which helps you distinguish it from other sandboxes.

Features.description: The add-on features to apply when creating or refreshing the sandbox.

HistoryDays.description: Represents the number of days of object history to be copied in the sandbox.

LicenseType.description: Represents the sandbox license type. Valid values: DEVELOPER DEVELOPER_PRO PARTIAL FULL

SourceId.description: A reference to the ID of a SandboxInfo that serves as the source org for a cloned sandbox.

TemplateId.description: A reference to the PartitionLevelScheme that represents the sandbox template associated with this sandbox. A sandbox template lets you select which objects to copy in a sandbox.
